pr_title: [7.X] Fix for productized assembly with spring-boot quickstart + fix for quarkus:dev

timeline.message: Fix for productized assembly with spring-boot quickstart + fix for quarkus:dev

timeline.bodyText:
Instead of adding the quickstart's jar and sources-jar, we include the "build from source" sources instead. This has 2 advantages:

users can get started with the quickstart by building and running it from source.
we don't need to depend on artifacts from the quickstart, which causes issues when productized and when pushed to maven central (we don't own groupId "com.examples").
timeline.author: ge0ffrey
